message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to commit to a maximum of $15000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $15000 is your maximum budget, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $18000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the effort, I am still unable to exceed my budget of $15000. I hope this helps us reach a fair agreement.
